INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the plasma concentrations of the active metabolite of the carbamazepine. In addition, decrease of the plasma concentrations of felbamate due to increase of its hepatic metabolism by the carbamazepine
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Clinical monitoring, plasma dosages, and possible adjustment of the dosages of the two anticonvulsants.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Decrease of the plasma concentrations and of the effectiveness of the felbamate and increase of the plasma concentrations of the phenobarbital, with risk of overdose.
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Clinical monitoring and testing of the plasma concentrations of phenobarbital with adjustment of the dosage if needed.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the plasma concentrations of phenytoin with risk of overdose, due to inhibition of its metabolism by the felbamate
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Clinical monitoring, testing of the plasma concentrations of phenytoin, and if needed, adjustment of its dosage during the treatment with the felbamate.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the plasma concentrations of the valproic acid, with risk of overdose
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Clinical and biological monitoring, and possible adjustment of the dosage of the valproate or of the valpromide during the treatment with the felbamate and after it is stopped.
